Aquila fica possuÃƒÂ­do de raiva e ciume e lanÃƒÂ§a uma maldicao sobre o casal: de dia ela sempre sera um falcÃƒÂ£o e de noite Navarre toma a forma de um lobo, sendo que desta forma fica o casal impedido de se entregar um ao outro. Eles tem como unico aliado Phillipe Gaston (Matthew Broderick), mais conhecido como Rato, que e o unico prisioneiro que escapou das muralhas de Aquila.


Philipe Gastone, a thief, escapes from the dungeon at Aquila, sparking a manhunt. He is nearly captured when Captain Navarre befriends him. Navarre has been hunted by the Bishop&#039;s men for two years, ever since he escaped with the Lady Isabeau who the Bishop has lusted after. Navarre and Isabeau have a curse that the Bishop has placed on them that causes Navarre to be a wolf during the night and Isabeau to be a hawk during the day. Navarre insists that Philipe help him re-enter the city to help him kill the heavily guarded Bishop.
